```{r setup}
library(locater)
library(kalis)
# Load simulated haplotypes and recombination map
CacheHaplotypes(SmallHaps)
pars <- Parameters(CalcRho(diff(SmallMap)))

# simulate m phenotypes
n <- N()/2
m <- 20
y <- matrix(rnorm(n*m),n,m)

TestLoci(y, pars, target.loci = 1:10, num.ckpts = 1L, verbose = TRUE, use.forking = FALSE, nthreads = 1L)

```
